title: Learning Design Thinking Development Course for Secondary Social Studies Teachers

context.prior_knowledge: Basic secondary social studies curriculum knowledge and classroom management experience
context.additional_context: Mobile-based microlearning designed for in-service secondary social studies teachers to practically implement learning design within their work environments, with continuous feedback through formative assessments.

learning_goals: Learners can apply a learning design framework suitable for secondary social studies contexts with 80% accuracy.
Learners can analyze educational problems using design-based research methodologies and propose three or more actionable solutions.
Learners can understand the concept of "fragmented pedagogical knowledge" and develop flexible instructional design strategies based on it.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
